phrs.translation: 反铲, 反铲装载机, 反铲挖土机, 锄耕机
反向铲铲土机, 反铲挖掘机
疯狂挖掘机, 模拟挖掘机中文版
反铲挖土机技工, 挖掘技工

sentences.sentence: Blake was a goateed young backhoe operator whom Carol had met across the counter at the license bureau.
sentences.translation: 布莱克是位蓄着山羊胡的年轻挖土机操作工，卡洛尔在执照管理局的柜台与其邂逅。

sentences.sentence: A loader is not the most efficient machine for digging as it cannot dig very deep below the level of its wheels as a backhoe can.
sentences.translation: 装载机不是最有效的机械，因为装载机不像挖土机那样能挖得比轮子深。

sentences.sentence: Last year, an anchor weighing seven stones was also discovered at the site after excavators uncovered curved timbers that a backhoe brought up.
sentences.translation: 去年，在挖土机挖掘出来的弯曲的木材之后，一个重达七块石头的锚也被发现了。
